task.prompt: Mark goes into the store to buy some groceries.  He buys 6 2$ cans of soup, 2 $5 loaves of bread, 2 3$ boxes of cereal, and 2 $4 gallons of milk.  When he gets to the register, he opens his wallet to pay and realizes he only has $10 bills in there.  How many $10 bills does he need to use to pay?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Mark goes into the store to buy some groceries.  He buys 6 2$ cans of soup, 2 $5 loaves of bread, 2 3$ boxes of cereal, and 2 $4 gallons of milk.  When he gets to the register, he opens his wallet to pay and realizes he only has $10 bills in there.  How many $10 bills does he need to use to pay?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
